Author: zombeezinthetrap
Text: You’re definitely not alone. When I got my diagnosis earlier this year I was adamant that I was just a disordered eater because I thought I could stop whenever I wanted to and I felt I didn’t fit the stereotype. But once confronted with the tools to change, my brain went haywire and my ED voice became very loud as opposed to just a habit that I had adopted because of my failing relationship. Either way, you should seek out professional help sooner than later even if you don’t feel ready for recovery now. This is just one of those things where if you continue to put it off, it will take ahold of your life whether you recognize it or not and by that point it will be harder to walk away!!
